short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add links to BGA, Yucata, and Steam to play games from your GeekGroup collection.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Built for: https://geekgroup.app/

On your collection page, this will add BGA/Yucata/Steam buttons for games that you own that are playable on those platforms.
